surprise.description: Some characters or parties may surprise others at the start of an encounter.
surprise.default_rule: Roll 1d6; surprise occurs on a result of 1–2.
surprise.notes: Referee may determine surprise narratively or modify chance based on conditions.

secret_doors.description: Characters can attempt to detect concealed or secret doors.
secret_doors.searching: Roll 1d6; success on a 1 when a character actively searches.
secret_doors.passive: Some creatures may detect doors passively or have better chances.
secret_doors.notes: Player must specify they are searching; Referee may increase chance for certain species or items.
